articles.title: Youngsters drawn in challenging group on return to EFL Trophy - Tottenham Hotspur
articles.description: We can confirm that our Development Squad has re-entered the EFL Trophy – known as the Papa John’s Trophy – for the forthcoming campaign, with the draw for the group stage pitting us against Oxford United, Cambridge United and Stevenage.
articles.content: Group A: Colchester United, Gillingham, Ipswich Town, West Ham United U21.Group B: AFC Wimbledon, Portsmouth, Sutton United, Crystal Palace U21.Group C: MK Dons, Burton Albion, Wycombe Wanderers, Ast… [+377 chars]
